frontMatter.title: GL.iNet Slate 7 (GL‑BE3600) Review: Your Ultimate Wi‑Fi 7 Travel Router
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: Discover the GL.iNet Slate 7: a compact Wi‑Fi 7 travel router with dual 2.5GbE ports, touchscreen interface, and OpenWrt for secure, high-speed connectivity anywhere.
